meta.title: Form File
meta.description: Customized, cross-browser consistent, file input control that supports single file, multiple files, drag and drop, and directory upload.

slots.name: file-name
slots.description: Scoped slot for formatting the file names. Scoped props: `files` - flat array of `File` objects, `names`: flat array of file names, `filesTraversed`: array of arrays of `File` objects when in directory mode

slots.name: placeholder
slots.description: Placeholder content, when no files selected. Defaults to `placeholder` prop value

slots.name: drop-placeholder
slots.description: Placeholder content when files are about to be dropped. Defaults to value of `drop-placeholder` prop

events.description: original native change event on input
